title: Client Always Crashing or Bugging out?
body:
Why is that the client always crashes for me? 

Run the Hextech repair does nothing at all like creates some logs which the riot support never tell me exactly what is happening so why do i get referred to tool that does nothing? 

Right now my game has crashed and i can't reconnect to my game without reinstalling the game completely this has happened about 4 times now and I'm getting really sick of the lack of support. 

The crashes seem completely random too with makes me believe it is the client itself that is causing the issue anyone else experiencing anything similar to me?

All i get when i restart the client is Game is in progress... 

With the older client before the refresh i had zero issues now it seem like every day i have some sort of issue with the client hit a bug in some manner 

Yet it seems that RIOT have no schedule what so ever about fixing the client and all its bugs.

Support just seems to come up with a new excuse every time i contact them saying its either my ISP or something else. 

I have ZERO issues with anything else apart from the league of legends client.

replies.body: I have the same issue, for whatever reason without any sign of a ping spike I will get randomly DC'd (usually before 4 minutes). The client will say 'attempting to reconnect', however to actually reconnect I need to exit the game and completely reload. It happens on average once per day and is absolutely frustrating to deal with.
